Summary: flash of lights high in sky over ski area , sphere shaped and fast.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Palmerton
There were no other sightings in Palmerton on or around November 15th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsI was heading to my girlfriends house on the evening in question from the Monroe County side of NEPA, I approached the ski area)BLue MTN.) from the main road leading towards the ski resort,( the access road goes over the Blue Mountain range and into the Lehigh Valley. I approached from the north facing the Mountain,I noticed the ski resort mtn. lights as I always do.I was about 2 miles away at this point. The area was just lit up to prepare for the upcoming ski season.At this time of the year though, their was still no snow , to the right of the mountain,I noticed a sphere,perhaps the size of a car hovering over the entire mountain, it had lots of unusual lights and appeared to be floating very still. as I approached and closed in to 1 mile it darted into the mountain range and disappeared. I finally headed up the road a bit cautious and confused. I stopped the car to see if their was any damage along the road or if any of the lights I had seen leading up to the road were still in the area. NOTHING...I cleared the top of the mountain and noticed nothing at all.I was a bit hesitant to disclose this , but recent reports I have read have made me change my mind. I do not know aht to believe. I think if something was out there , it will be a matter of time before it makes another appearance.
Object Shape: Bullet, Missile, Fireball, Sphere, Star-like, Teardrop
